edu.upc.fib.prop.persistence.dao.documents

Interface DaoDocuments

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DaoDocumentsImpl

    public interface DaoDocuments
    Data Access Object for documents in persistence.

        c - DB connection.
        doc - Document to rate.
        rating - Points given to the document.
        user - User who rates the document.
        Throws:
        DocumentNotFoundException - when document not found in the system.
